questionTitle: My husband or my daughters __________________ the dishes every day.
My daughters or my husband __________________ the dishes every day.
A high percentage of the population __________________ voting against the new incinerator.
A high percentage of the people __________________ voting against the new incinerator.
Not only the teacher but also the students __________________ given a reprimand by the headmaster.
Not only the students but also the teacher __________________ given a reprimand by the headmaster.
The robber, along with his two accomplices,__________________ sent to jail
Tara, together with her mates,__________________ a team of the highest level
Some of the crop __________________ been spoiled by the storm.
Some of the cherries __________________ been spoiled by the rain.
Neither Pablo nor his parents __________________ interested in football.
Neither the parents nor their son __________________ interested in football.
